divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 9:30 p.m. and I began walk on the walkway to my house as I saw a very fast object fliying over my house. I could not tell how high the craft was in the sky overhead because all I saw were the four horizontal white lights that I could tell were on the craft. It was traveling very fast. Faster than any jet I have ever seen before. As the lights went over my head the lights turned vertical and I was speechlees because it made absolutley no noise. As I turned my head it kept its speed and I lost veiw of the lights in about two seconds. Nothing can travel that fast and be that low to the ground and not make a sound that we know is in existence It was just incredible.
